verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Tell with every breath
That the Saviour still is conqu'or
Over sin and death

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Tell wher'er you go
That the Lord is still the Conq'ror
Over every foe

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor,
Pain and sickness flee,
When we plead the mighty victory
Won on Calvary.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Therefore do and dare
Go wherever Jesus sends you
In prevailing prayer

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
No defeat nor fear
Evermore must dim thy vision
Christ the way will clear

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Christ is Victor
Soon His voice shall ring
"Come ye conqu'rors
come up hither
Join thy conqu'roring King
